description:
The course teaches you Search Engine Marketing, and especially, how to use Google AdWords to meet your marketing objectives. This is an indepth course, with practical hands on guide. You can expert to start running campaigns for top brands after undergoing this program. I have ensured that only the crux of digital marketing is included in the program, so that you only work on what is necessary and are not overloaded with a lot of material which you can never finish.

Its a course meant for Search Engine marketers, entrepreneurs or students willing to get into the magic world of online advertising and digital marketing.

The course contains 3 parts - Online Advertising Fundamentals, Search Advanced, and Display Advertising. In this program, you will learn all about creating, managing and optimising campaigns meant for brand building, lead generation or online sales. You will learn to run campaigns for search and display networks on desktop, and mobile platforms using text, image, rich media or video ad formats.

A very comprehensive program for everyone in Online Advertising. The program will also prepare you for the Google Certification exams and help you get Google AdWords certified.
title: Search Engine Marketing (SEM) from an ex-Googler
